about_the_game:
The past is present in 20 tracks of JRPG-style high fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Rekindle the classic sounds of the 16-bit and 32-bit console era music and fill your game with nostalgic charm. Adventure, action and emotion fill this pack. Also includes 20 Music Events!

Features:

- 20 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, field, themes, and towns!
- 20 Music Events for memorable moments!
- .ogg, .wav and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV projects or the engine of your choice.

Tracklist:

Battle - Baroque Ba-rawl
Battle - Braver And Bolder
Battle - Cave Monsters
Battle - Perfidious Pirates
Battle - War Priests
Dungeon - Lost Underground
Dungeon - Military Prison
Dungeon - Other Place
Dungeon - Portal Realm
Dungeon - Sorcerous Vault
Field - Desolate Domain
Field - Golden Harvest
Field - Hades Holiday
Theme - Courting The Princess
Theme - Festival Fun
Town - Fancy Castle
Town - Nice Day Out
Town - Peaceful Place
Town - Shop Hopping
Town - Tavern Tune

short_description: Twenty new tracks of classic JRPG-style fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Melodic mayhem for high adventure! Also includes 20 Music Events.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
